Package si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence.classification

Class ClassesProbabilities

java.lang.Object
si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence.PredictionConfidence
si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence.classification.ClassesProbabilities
public class ClassesProbabilities extends PredictionConfidence
Calculate the confidence of prediction for the multi-target classification as follows: For each target, get the max classification probability (i.e., majority) among possible class values.
Author:
jurical
